resources.string:
Point
The app shows real-time exchange rates of Russian ruble against USD and EUR (USDRUB_TOM, EURRUB_TOM)

Attention
The rates cannot be reliable during weekends and holidays. Wait for a MICEX opening at 10:00MSK

Source 
The data are taken from www.profinance.ru. As far as I know, this resource is pretty accurate. However, do not trade billions solely based on this information :-). A moment of time below the rate is taken from the resource and should be a time of the rate

If you find that the app does not work anymore, please, send me a message

Credits 
www.profinance.ru - data source
www.flaticon.com - icons

About
Version: 2.5
Author: Stanislav Lavrov
2slavrov@gmail.com
WARNING! It can be not a trading hour. Rates can be incorrect
